response.overview: A couple and their children move into a seemingly normal suburban home. When strange events occur, they begin to believe there is something else in the house with them. The presence is about to disrupt their lives in unimaginable ways.
response.tagline: In this house there is a presence.
response.title: Presence

release_dates.note: Sitges International Fantastic Film Festival of Catalonia

results.name: PRESENCE Cast Share Their Favourite Horror Films
